content:
Urban art legend Banksy – at least we think it’s him – offers up his take on the recent finance fiasco. Trust him to say it how it is. Banksy goes to great lengths to ensure he is never caught on camera and few people know what he really looks like, so the photographer, 
, has done well to catch him in the act.
Banksy has been in New York recently promoting his new 
, featuring living Chicken McNuggets, swimming fish-sticks, and nuzzling hot dogs. Giant murals tying in with the show are popping up all over the Big Apple. Here's a little morsel of his new works:

Source
title: Banksy: Let Them Eat Crack [PICS]
author: Linda
